programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: At the 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix, the Sprint Shootout makes its debut in Baku - an all-new qualifying format that will set the grid for the afternoon's shortened 100km F1 Sprint.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: For the first time in 2023, it's time to Sprint as the Azerbaijan Grand Prix sees the first of six F1 Sprints. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag.

programme.title: Ted's Notebook
programme.desc: Ted Kravitz brings his Notebook to the 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix - the venue for the first Sprint of the 2023 calendar - as he looks back on the race and shares his thoughts.
